en.createsnippet.sign_in_warning: You need to sign in to be able to publish snippets
en.createsnippet.fields_error: You need to fill in the required fields
en.createsnippet.uploads_error: You need to upload the required files
en.createsnippet.name: NAME
en.createsnippet.namesub: A good, and preferably short name for your code snippet
en.createsnippet.catchsub: A quick, short, and concise description for your code snippet
en.createsnippet.descsub: A longer, more precise description for your code snippet
en.createsnippet.descholder: This is the detailed description of my awesome snippet!
en.createsnippet.codesub: The code of your code snippet, this is the one that will be downloaded by other users
en.createsnippet.imgs_sub: Upload the gallery images for your code snippet
en.createsnippet.base_version_sub: The base version of your code snippet (e.g. 1.0, ALPHA, 1.0.0A)

fr.createsnippet.sign_in_warning: Vous devez vous connecter pour pouvoir publier des snippets
fr.createsnippet.fields_error: Vous devez remplir les champs obligatoires
fr.createsnippet.uploads_error: Vous devez télécharger les fichiers requis
fr.createsnippet.name: NOM
fr.createsnippet.namesub: Un bon nom, de préférence court, pour votre snippet
